name: Classic Margarita
instructions: If desired, rim the glass with salt by rubbing a lime wedge around the rim and dipping it in salt.
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds until well chilled.
Strain into a salt-rimmed glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.
Serve immediately and enjoy responsibly!

name: Fresh Mojito
instructions: Lightly muddle the mint leaves in a glass with simple syrup.
Add lime juice and rum to the glass.
Fill the glass with ice.
Top with club soda and gently stir.
Garnish with a lime wedge and fresh mint sprig.
Serve with a straw and enjoy!

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Place sugar cube in an Old Fashioned glass and add bitters.
Muddle the sugar cube until it dissolves (or use simple syrup).
Add a large ice cube or sphere.
Pour in the whiskey and stir gently for 20-30 seconds.
Express the orange peel over the drink and drop it in.
Garnish with a cherry if desired.
Serve and enjoy this classic cocktail!

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice.
Shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: If using egg white, add it to a shaker first (dry shake without ice for 10 seconds).
Add bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Fill shaker with ice and shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with a lemon slice and cherry.
Serve and enjoy this classic sour cocktail!
